Sound of defusing
Sound of picking up a weapon
Anticheat
Sign in with Facebook
Sign in with Google
Bugfixes

Fix connection issues,
Fix "Speedhack detector"
Added "Well played" rewards

Fix weapon buy critical bug

Fix connection issues,
Fix "Speedhack detector"
Added "Well played" rewards

• New weapons - M40 and FAMAS
• New maps - Sandstone and Sand Yards
• New model of the Terrorist
• New collection of skins - Furious Collection
• New knife - Karambit
• All sounds updated
• Background music
• Weapon inspection animati

• Reworked anti-cheat
• Updated the item inspection interface in inventory
• Added option to disable music after planting the bomb
• Fixed minor bugs on maps
• Fixed a bug with killing a player standing close to the wall, through the wall
•

•Anti-cheat updated
•Anisotropic filtering options extended
•Anti-aliasing options added
•Issues on maps are fixed
•Issues with weapon models are fixed
•RAM usage optimized

- Marketplace
- Markers above players
- Reworked map "Province"
- New regions (West Asia, Brazil, Australia)
- Crosshair customization
- New knife "M9 Bayonet" (added to Origin Collection and Assistance Collection)
- Reworked M16 and AKR

• New map - Rust ("Defuse")
• HE grenade
• StatTrack skins
• New AKR sound
• Post-processing effects in graphics settings
• Now the planted bomb displays on the CT's radar after finding
• The Zone 9 map has been temporarily removed from

***0.10.3***
• Optimizations
• New anti-cheat
• New "Classic" view arms and weapon(can be changed in settings)
• Minor marketplace bug fixes
• Decreased accuracy in the jump
• Bug fixes

• New Year Event
• New knife - jKommando
• New weapon - MP7
• Flashbang and smoke grenades
• New collection "Rival Collection"
• Minor bug fix

• Fixed control lags
• Fixed anti-cheat
• Improved purchase confirmation mechanism in case of disconnection
• Removed the new year mode "Santa Claus"

• New weapon - USP
• New model KT - F.B.I.
• Added inspection of medals in the inventory
• Added inspection animations for all weapon
• Added tagging - character slowing when taking damage
• Added impact from the fall, which slowing down th

• GIGN model was returned to Province and Village maps.
• GIGN hand texture was updated
• Reduced impact when landing
• Fixed player invisibility bug
• Fixed networking lags
• Improved anti-cheat

Standoff 2 is two years old!
For that reason we launch temporary event “2 Years Celebration”!
Take part in 3 special game modes that will definitely give you maximum fun!
Earn special points and exchange them for exclusive skins!

Classic i

Optimization,
New game mode

Fixes:
• Fixed the bug causing sound crash
• Optimization for devices with 1GB RAM
Changes:
• Competitive mode is now available at 5th level
• Drop chance of valuable items and items from “Nameless” collection is increased in Competitive mo

The “New Year Madness” in Standoff 2 starts today and lasts for 28 days!
Play 3 new temporary modes: show your skill defending the position in King of the Hill,
cover your enemies with snow in Snow Madness, or become crazy Santa in Santa mode.

***0.12.2***
New Year Madness 2020 Event finished
Optimization
Veteran 2020 Medals are available
Bug fix
Anticheat improved

***0.12.4***
Fixed a critical bug with connecting to the server
Fixed bug with radar
Fixed a bug with the error of reconnecting the lobby leader to a closed game
Fixed a bug with picking weapons
Many minor bugs fixed

Bugs fixed,
Localization issues fixed
Localization files updated and fixed

Presenting the new update, code-named Project Z9!
What's in:
- The start of Season 1 — the first ever Standoff 2 game season
- A battle pass with unique missions
- The special Interception game mode
- Zone 9 map has returned in updated form

*****0.13.2*****
Reverb effect was removed for a while since current implementation was causing performance downgrade and sound artifacts
Performance and memory optimization

- the bug duplicating containers in the Interception mode has been fixed
- the bug allowing to get maximum amount of money when reconnecting to the match has been fixed
- RAM usage of a device has been optimized
-“Province” map has been rebalance

- the bug duplicating containers in the Interception mode has been fixed
- the bug allowing to get maximum amount of money when reconnecting to the match has been fixed
- RAM usage of a device has been optimized
-“Province” map has been rebalance

New temporary mode “Arcade”.
Try your fighting skills on large maps.

Zone 9 changes.
New balance of “A” point and one small, but tactically important doorway.

***0.13.7***
• Changes in the rating system
• Updated penalty system
• Added disable game notifications option in the menu
• Fixed bugs

Season 2 has started!
Join a clan war together with your team! Take part in clan vs. clan battles based on competitive rules.
Explore the autumnal Rust map!
Leaves under your feet, ominous fallen trees, and ravens cawing eerily in the distance.

Season 2 is in full play!

To make it even more fun, we released this interim patch.

It includes:
• Special offer by the end of Halloween
• Indication of the player's height position on the radar
• Bug fix

Enjoy the game!

Minor bugs fix
Localization files update
Game crushes on some devices fixed

Introducing the "Little Helper" Protocol holiday event!


Determine the fate of Christmas by becoming one of Santa's little helpers or by joining the scheming green elves.


Play the Gift Hunt and Spirit of Christmas limited-time modes,

The Little Helper Protocol festive event has come to an end. 
But don't be sad because of it, a lot of adventures are waiting for you ahead.
As for now, let's us tell you what's new happened in this patch: 
[Added] 
• New Vetera
